connector.description: Upload objects to Google Cloud Storage.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-sink.bucket.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-sink.bucketNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.google-storage-sink.bucket.description: The Google Cloud Storage bucket name or Bucket Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

camel.kamelet.google-storage-sink.servic.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-sink.serviceAccountKey
camel.kamelet.google-storage-sink.servic.description: The service account key to use as credentials for Google Cloud Storage access. You must encode this value in base64.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-sink.autoCr.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-sink.autoCreateBucket
camel.kamelet.google-storage-sink.autoCr.description: Specifies to automatically create the Google Cloud Storage bucket.
